algorithm_technique: Direct calculation based on parity and value of n
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum cuts to divide a circle into n equal slices.
problem_summary_technical: Calculates minimum cuts for n slices: 0 for n=1, n for odd n, n/2 for even n.
key_insights: Cuts through the center are most efficient.
For n=1, no cuts are needed.
Even n can be divided by n/2 diameter cuts, odd n requires n radial cuts.
